class pychell.data.rvdata.RVData(t, rv, rverr, instname=None, wavelength=None)Â¶

Bases: optimize.data.SimpleSeries

Construct an RV data object for a particular instrument.

Parameters

  • t (np.ndarray) â The time vector.

  • rv (np.ndarray) â The RVs vector.

  • rverr (np.ndarray) â The RVs error vector.

  • instname (np.ndarray, optional) â The label for this dataset. Defaults to None initially, and is then replaced by the the key provided when constructing a composite dataset.

  • wavelength (np.ndarray, optional) â The effective wavelength of the dataset. Defaults to None.

classmethod from_file(fname, instname=None, delimiter=',', skiprows=0, usecols=None, wavelength=None)Â¶

Constructor from a delimited file.

Parameters

  • fname (str) â The full path and filename.

  • instname (str, optional) â The name of the instrument. Defaults to None.

  • delimiter (str, optional) â The delimiter. Defaults to â,â.

  • skiprows (int, optional) â Which rows to skip. Defaults to 0.

  • usecols (tuple of ints, optional) â The columns corresponding to time, rv, rverr. Defaults to (0, 1, 2).

  • wavelength (float, optional) â The wavelength of this dataset. Defaults to None.

Returns

The RV data object for this instrument.
